summary: This four-part anthology takes its cue from the short fiction of legendary horror writer Edogawa Rampo.
cast: Tadanobu Asano|Yûko Daike|Chisako Hara|Masami Horiuchi|Mikako Ichikawa|Hanae Kan|Ryûhei Matsuda|Kaiji Moriyama|Tomoya Nakamura|Hiroki Narimiya|Tamaki Ogawa|Nao Ohmori|Yukiko Okamoto|Tarô Suwa|Hiromasa Taguchi|Minori Terada|Susumu Terajima|Yumi Yoshiyuki
director: Directors: Akio Jissôji, Atsushi Kaneko | 2 more credits »
title: Ranpo jigoku
